review: Still can't find a way to project simple non-"app" applications like MS Excel to the screen.  I have a Surface Pro 3 linking to a brand new Samsung 60" LED 3D Smart TV.  Neither Chromecast nor Samsung's app work to truly mirror the screen wirelessly.Video playback (e.g. via netflix, Youtube or Chrome / IE / Firefox) is very laggy (much more so than watching directly on the device).

review: This is possibly the best thing ever invented. The only way it is hard to set up is if you can't read. I've used it for everything from the usuall stuff like TV shows, streaming YouTube and Comcast to some other stuff like a projector replacesment - I just cast my powerpoints from my smartphone!Buy this. Buy one for every TV you have. Do it now.
